channel.title: Comments on: And You Can Quote Them

item.title: By: Errant Thoughts
item.dc:creator: Errant Thoughts
item.content:encoded:
Things you’ll never see on the Warcraft forums……

Foton has posted quotes from a great list of Phrases you will never see on the WoW Forums. This originated from a thread on the Warcraft forums themselves, but AFKG is the better bet for being able to find the best ones archived long-term.
My humble su…

item.title: By: Rick
item.dc:creator: Rick
item.description: This made me laugh at work. Nice find. Yet again, I'm glad AFK Gamer is on my list of sites to read. Thanks Foton.
item.content:encoded: This made me laugh at work. Nice find. Yet again, I’m glad AFK Gamer is on my list of sites to read. Thanks Foton.

item.title: By: brackishwater
item.dc:creator: brackishwater
item.description:
I love the second to last one.
Here is one: "I read the manual and did some research on my own before asking this, but...."
item.content:encoded:
I love the second to last one.

Here is one: “I read the manual and did some research on my own before asking this, but….”

item.title: By: Hexapuma
item.dc:creator: Hexapuma
item.description: That was spot on... I am always amazed to see how no one can come to an agreement on the forums... or how hatred between various posters can be so intense.
item.content:encoded: That was spot on… I am always amazed to see how no one can come to an agreement on the forums… or how hatred between various posters can be so intense.
